SELECT COUNT(*) FROM product WHERE name LIKE '%'||#{name}||'%'
SELECT pseq, regdate, name, price1, price2, useyn, bestyn FROM product WHERE name LIKE '%'||#{name}||'%' ORDER BY name

SELECT rn, pseq, regdate, name, price1, price2, useyn, bestyn FROM (SELECT row_number() OVER (ORDER BY name) rn, pseq, regdate, name, price1, price2, useyn, bestyn FROM product WHERE name LIKE '%'||#{name}||'%') WHERE rn > (#{criteria.pageNum} - 1) * #{criteria.rowsPerPage} AND rn <= (#{criteria.pageNum} * #{criteria.rowsPerPage})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product(pseq, kind, name, price1, price2, price3, content, image) VALUES(product_seq.NEXTVAL, #{kind}, #{name}, #{price1}, #{price2}, #{price3}, #{content}, #{image})
